tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Found my Doctor and I'm never going to anyone else till the time I am in Bangalore. She cares about patients and is quite upfront. Tells you clearly what is the problem and how it can be handled. Doesn't try to do everything herself. She'll get you expert dental surgeons if needed. Takes time to talk to patients and explain to them what they can and cannot do. Answers all your questions and more. After my tooth extraction I was sat down for about an hour and told each instuction in detail. she ensured it was drilled down in my head. Lot of problems can be avoided if patients understand what precautions to take. Like I cannot sleep keeping that cheek down where she operated. I think she might even come in my dreams and tell me to not sleep on that side. Or I'll hear her stern voice in my head if I'm even thinking about eating something hot or spicy after the surgery. 😂

But jokes apart, she really cares about her patients and give them ample time. Trust her, be honest, and leave it to her to see your problem solved. 😊

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Tooth Coloured Fillings,
review:
Doctor Amrita was referred to me by a friend .
The clinic is very neatly maintained.
You are given a PPE kit , hands sanitized , your O2 sat is checked and you are steamed  . All COVID precautions are taken .

Doctor upfront told me she will not hurry with me because she takes her time and takes 100s of Xrays to ensure she has the right prognosis.

I've never had a lesser painful tooth injection ever . I thank the doctor's skills for that.

I got 8 fillings and 2 RCTs done with her and I have to say I am very happy with her work . 
Would surely recommend her to anyone who has any kind of teeth issues .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I had taken my mother for regular oral checkup to understand why there is so much foul smell. Doctor Amrita was very descriptive in making us understand the situation of gap formation, discoloration and decay. She suggested that my mother has to get her two last teeth removed and though my mom was very scared, the procedure was carried out with utmost care and very clearly explained. The post procedure followup calls from the clinic were also very detailed to get to know the situation. There was no infection or swelling. Thank you doc for making us feel confident about the procedure and taking care! :)

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Overall experience for the first time was good. The doctor is very friendly and its a great place. The staff are also very polite

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review:
*** ********* ** ********* ******** Very thorough and caring, took extra mile to make us feel comfortable. Explains each and every process. Extracted 2 teeth which was absolutely painless and without any complication ( because of diabetics). 
Thank you doctor

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,Explanation of the health issue,
review: I was suffering from gum pain from couple of days. I visited the clinic and explained the problem. Doctor checked and provided the treatment. When I was coming out from clinic, pain was not there. Thanks to doctor for giving such a nice treatment and that also without any pain.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,
review: The doctor explained the issue with my teeth which I didn’t know about at all. The clinic was well sanitised and hygienic and all measures for covid were taken care of. The staff are prompt and check all the parameters before starting treatment. Treatment was smooth and painless. Would definitely recommend !

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I am a regular visitor of clinic and keeps on doing my teeth scaling regularly. Recently I had brought my kids and his milk teeth had gone. For him it was an awesome experience and I didn't have to even explain anything. Doctor handled everything.
Keep on doing good Dr Amruta.

Thank you !!?

Would surely recommend the doctor and the clinic for the wonderful dental experience 😬

I would strongly recommend  this clinic among friends and family.

review:
I have been coming to Doctor Amrita for long time now. Most of my RCT treatment is done here. She very good at her work and does great job. Very knowledgeable. I have recommended her to most of my friends and colleagues and they have been also consulting her for any dental related issues.
Best part is the support provided by her and whole staff who will periodically call you to check on you if everything is fine or any issues faced after treatment.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Although going to a doctor is never good. But, the experience compared to my last dental treatment was simply awsome. No forced treatments. Patient consent was priority. Very informative. 

Doctor Amrita and the staff were very promt. Big thankyou for dr meenakshi as well. Sorry if i didn't get the name right. 😊

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Consulted Dr. Meenakshi. The doctor was cool. The cleaning procedure was quick considering the amount of deposits on my teeth. She did a pretty good job which made me feel that she is a skilled doctor.
Even she took effort to explain me the mistakes i do while brushing and how to correct those. Overall a very good experience. Looking forward to go for a second sitting soon.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,
review: I had visited Dr Amrita for my father's tooth pain. Dr suggested to go for rct for three teeth in molar region to save those teeth. The rct cost looked bit on the higher side but she gave some senior citizen discount. She explained that my father case was not complicated and she appointed a rct specialist who was very good. She took total 4 sittings but, I thought it could have been done in 3 sittings. My father was satisfied with the treatment.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Dr. Amrita is a very experienced and friendly doctor. I have visited the clinic because of dental pain and dental crowns. She helped me in crown selection and also recommended the best crown depends on my budget.

I am very much happy with the treatment and will definitely recommend Dr. Amrita for all kind of dental related issues.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I went in to this clinic with an intention to clean my teeth and to check overall health of them. I did the cleaning however I realised she started forcing me to remove the decayed teeth(yes I should).

Yes ,  she is very expensive..It did take 2 weeks for me to recover
My expense to clean and remove two teeth with surgical removal of one was close to 12k. 

*** ******* ********** ** *** *** **** ******* ***** ********* ** ** **** ******** *** ******* ****** ** ** *** ******** *************** **** **** *** ****** **** *****
reply_text: I'm sure there will be some misunderstanding.. regarding the treatment and charges as for cleaning we will never charge so much..for tooth extraction if it's surgical extraction it will come with the instrument surgeon cost xray follow up sitting and suture removal...

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: This is the first time I have gone to any dental hospital for wisdom tooth extraction. I am little bit nervous. But as soon as I entered the clinic at the entry level, they have screened me for temp., my hands are sanitized & one more thing is impressive was my foot is sanitized through a sanitized door mat. My complete body is sanitized through fogger m/c. All staff members are wearing PPE kit. So considering the pandemic situation, for cleanliness I will give 5 out of 5 stars. Dr. Amrita is nicest, cleanest, friendliest and most efficient doctor I have ever been to. She is expert with down to earth quality. She explained me well about the problem & situation. The clinic is well equipped. Staff is well trained and very fast.
